table.name: vtiger_rsnimportsources
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_rsnimportsources` ( `rsnimportsourcesid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `tabid` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `disabled` VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT NULL, `class` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `sortorderid` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `description` TEXT DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rsnimportsourcesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_rsnimportsourcescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_rsnimportsourcescf` ( `rsnimportsourcesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rsnimportsourcesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
